title: Weird question but your champion mastery points
body:
I'm wondering looking at my mastery points on my champions and knowing people will have a lot also and I'm interested if you are an all champions kinda of player like me or someone who has over 500k points on your main.
My current Champion points are:
Level 7: 2 (Anivia, Rengar)
Level 6: 9 (Vayne, Yasuo, Leona, Thresh, Viktor, Zed, Elise, Sona, Ekko)
Level 5: 8 (Riven, Blitz, Kog, Lee, Gp, Janna, Lucian and Raka)
Level 4: 10-15 (Galio, Malphite, Ahri, Darius, Varus, Aurelion, Bard, Draven, Xerath and many more) 
Cheers love to hear your mains and your champion points achievements 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body:
Almost 800k mastery points on Teemo {{champion:17}} 

got the level 7 sniper emote as well
what's your favourite teemo build? Mine has got to be either the standard mushroom map control or the cheesy atk speed hybrid bruiser build.

I comfort pick in ranked, so my top two champions (Nami and Morgana) have way more mastery points than any other champ by far. 

Last year I wanted to go through and get mastery 5 on all of my champions. I got 29 level 5 before I got busy. Been working on getting more, but also started playing my mains again trying to get tokens for the upgrade. 

You can check my list **[here](http://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/summoner/?summoner=yaiamone&region=OCE)** (<- a super useful summary website to do with all things mastery)

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=crjExiW4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-12T00:25:37.643+0000)


Wow that is so good, 29! jesus Nice!. Also didn't know that site thank you, i have a lot of level 4's that i want make level 5 being Galio, Xerath, Graves, Vi, Veigar as my main ones i want to level up it's a lot but meh

you've been playing for alot longer than I have then. I've been playing for half a year now and have my main 40k M7 Zilean.

And then other champions I used to play 30k lvl5 Alistair, 40k lvl5 Cho'gath, 40k lvl5 Mundo, 30k lvl5 Blitzcrank, 30k lvl5 Soraka, 30k lvl5 Teemo, 30k lvl5 Heimerdinger, 30k lvl5 Warwick, 40k lvl5 Nunu.

My favourite jungler to have fun with my almost lvl6 35k Shaco. I think that's all my lvl5+ champions. I main zilean though but I can play pretty much any support at around my regular skill level since I kinda suck at league and don't really spend enough time playing only a few champions.
Yeah i've been playing since the end of season 3 and i wish it was season 4 again it has changed sooo much but they are really good and also good to see someone not playing "Meta" champions.
I've been playing since end of s3 too not a single lvl 5 :'(
